data.text: DFCCIL Junior Executive Exam Date for CBT 2 Out! The exam will be held on 17th December 2023. The DFCCIL Junior Executive Admit Card for the same has been sent to the registered email of the candidates. The CBT Stage 1 exam was conducted on 23rd and 24th August 2023. The Dedicated Freight Corridor Corporation of India Limited (DFCCIL) had announced 181 vacancies for the post of DFCCIL Junior Executive in various disciplines like Electrical, Mechanical, and others. The selection process includes Computer Based Test (CBT) Stage I, Computer Based Test Stage - I, Document Verification, and Medical Test. The selected candidates will be entitled to a salary in the range of Rs. 25,000 to Rs. 68,000. Prepare for the examination using DFCCIL Junior Executive Previous Year Papers.
